data.prayer: Lord, make the 3,706 believers in Florida to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 7,694 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Florida, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Florida, Puerto Rico, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Florida, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Florida, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 11,400 citizens of the the state of Florida.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Pajonal
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Pajonal, Florida, Puerto Rico.
Father, encourage the 3,706 believers in Florida to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Florida do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Florida.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
